data_description.prompt: Instruct how the LLM should respond. This can be a template.
data_description.num_ctx: Maximum number of text tokens the model can process. Lower to reduce Ollama RAM, or increase for a large number of exposed entities.
data_description.keep_alive: Duration in seconds for Ollama to keep model in memory. -1 = indefinite, 0 = never.
data_description.think: If enabled, the LLM will think before responding. This can improve response quality but may increase latency.
data_description.filler_model: Small, fast model used to generate a brief 'checking...' phrase while the main model processes.
data_description.filler_prompt: Prompt template for generating filler phrases.
